name: Best Preparation
description: Best job on preparing for the hackathon, e.g. project skeleton in GitHub, communication in Slack channel, description in the Wiki)

name: Fun Event Winner
description: Winner of the activity of the day before the hackathon

name: Half-time Most Promising
description: After the first hackathon day, the most promising project

name: Best Presentation After Hackathon Block I
description: Best presentation after the first hackathon block on Wednesday morning

name: Best Presentation After Hackathon Block II
description: Best presentation after the second hackathon block on Wednesday at noon

name: Best Presentation After Hackathon Block III
description: Best presentation after the third hackathon block on Wednesday afternoon

name: Best Presentation After Hackathon Block IV
description: Best presentation after the fourth hackathon block on Thursday morning

name: Best Final Presentation
description: Best final presentation on Thursday afternoon

name: Software Development Best Practices
description: Best use of continuous integration, unit tests, etc.
